cite-desc: Pa'aseri la <ref> and <references> tags for citations
cite_error_ref_numeric_key: Dagi ma'a <ref> tag; name cannot be a simple integer. Use a descriptive title
cite_error_ref_no_key: Yu'ure la <ref> tag is malformed or has a bad name
cite_error_ref_too_many_keys: Dagi ma'a <ref> tag; invalid names, e.g. too many
cite_error_ref_nested_extends: Dikera paara <ref> tags more than one level deep is not allowed
cite_error_ref_no_input: Invalid <ref> tag; viisegɔ lɔgerɔ n tari yu'urɛ nari ti la tara yelesum
cite-tracking-category-cite-error: Pɛga n tari viisegɔ tuure duma
cite-tracking-category-cite-error-desc: Pɛga n boi buuri buuri wa tarı la tuure duma n boi a tuuma viisegɔ lɔgerɔ "yaga"
cite-wikieditor-help-content-rereference: Viisegɔ lɔgerɔ tuuma asi'a le yɛ'ɛsa
